Articles.Content:
SBF-Alpha07 System

I was messing around with creating planets and system using Planet Factory CE.

The result wasÃ¢â‚¬Â¦Well not normal.

This planet pack along with the mod itself takes up a LOT of memory, so don't use this if you think you have a bad PC!

Red text means: Not started.

Blue text means: In progress.

Green text means: Done.

Orange text means: Done, but may be subject to change.

Installation Steps:

1. Download the system here or in the downloads section(Don't forget you need Planet Factory CE for this to work!)

2. Unzip the file and drop it into:

KSP/GameData/PlanetFactory/PluginData/PlanetFactory/

3. Remove the 3 Example system.

4. If done correctly you can now start KSP and play.

Other Info...

Install ATM for reducing RAM usage(seriously,who doesn't have it?)

This pack is a WIP and i plan on adding more bodies.

Note: This system lies out very and i mean VERY far!

Planets

SRB-01 - The first sun.

SRB-02 - The second sun.

G1-Omega - First planet.

G2-Sigma - First moon of G1-Omega.

G3-Zeta - Second moon of G1-Omega

G4-Tau - Second planet, first Gas Giant.

G5-Pi - Third Planet, second Gas Giant. (Not yet released)

Unknown Object - Sort of an easter egg, remains of a Gas Giant. (Not yet released)

Downloads

SBF-Alpha07 System(Mediafire)

Planet Factory CE(Links to the thread)

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Changelog

v0.6 Gave planets much better textures.

v0.5 Added G4-Tau, a Gas Giant.

v0.3 Fixed textures, added Screenshots to the post.

v0.1 - Released on KSP Forums.

Credits

Don't redistribute without permission.

Edited May 10, 2014 by ThatNoob
Good News!
u need to add ss no one wants to test a planet mod that takes up alot of ram without seeing it first

Update!

Only 1 thing has changed:

The planets now have actual textures instead of the default texture.

Also added some screenshots.

I'll be pushing out an update soon.

Just testing some things like, the textures showing up.

Just updated it.

New in v0.5 is:

+ G4-Tau added. Planet is a Gas Giant.

I dont plan on adding another planets to my install soon, but that aside i think these random letters and numbers next to planets and suns names are nice xD

Id adds this space opera/sci fi feel.

I dont plan on adding another planets to my install soon, but that aside i think these random letters and numbers next to planets and suns names are nice xD

Id adds this space opera/sci fi feel.

The names are actually just a random character in the alphabet, and then i add a Character from the Greek (if i'm correct) alphabet.

But thanks!

Update!

I changed the textures of the planets, and hope they look much better now.
There is no .bin file for the Omega planet. Please update!

There is no .bin file for the Omega planet. Please update!

Seriously? I didn't even notice. Sorry.

I'll update in a few minutes.

Ahh, finally updated and now the planets textures work...

Also G1-Omega now has a .bin.

v0.7 can be downloaded here

Just downloaded, thanks! I will check it out.

Tau is probably OK, but the three planets need better textures. Textures with a higher resolution.
